describe.currently: Adam Smith is writing a book about the importance of creativity and how it can shape the world. Adam is also curious about who will be running for the local mayor election next month.
describe.lifestyle: Adam Smith goes to bed around 8pm, awakes up around 4am, eats dinner around 5pm.
